Eric B & Rakim Summer Conect 2017

In 2017, I had the honor to witness and shoot one the most iconc artist & founders or hip-hop in a live concert. Rakim on the mic and Eric B on the one's and two's was a moment that I loved to be there and honor to shoot live!

NY Fashion Week 2018

One of my staple moments in my Photography career was when I was given the oppertunity to shoot in NewYork Fashion Week. This week is the mecca of all events when it comes to fashion and runway.
